Summary: we observed a saucer shaped object, tree top heigth approximately 300 feet from our car, saw different colored windows circling the saucer, very dramatic. We could believe what we saw and were hesitent to tell anyone including ouf family
divs: Sighting DetailsI reported this sighting some years back and never heard from Mufon. My wife and I both saw the "UFO" I called the local police and they had numerous call regarding the subject. I'm 72 now so I anyone is interested in talking to me or "us" please get back to me. We saw the UFO up close, tree top level had quite an experience
